features: TEACHING TOOLS: Fun toddler toys for 1 year old can be used to teach in Montessori school, home schooling, or early childhood development.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED; we offer superb educational toys and excellent customer service and if you're not totally satisfied with your purchase; we also offer a risk-free, No-Questions-Asked, 100% Money-back Guarantee! Click the orange button to order now!

12 DIFFERENT COLORS & 12 DIFFERENT SHAPES: The peg shape sorter and stacking toys set are ideal pegboard educational toys for 2 Year Olds to learn pincer grip & improve dexterity. The preschool & toddler learning toys for 5, 4, 3 year old girls and boys include learning games & toddler activities in eBook with puzzles for 2 year olds and toddler games. The toddler toys has 36 Pegs (2"X1.25"), Large foam board (8" inch square) & Skoolzy toy storage bag

COLORFUL OVERSIZE PEGS kids toys are easy for little fingers to grasp & stack towers on the peg board as construction building blocks for toddlers. The geometric shapes kids toys age 2, 3, or 4 also work as lacing toys or building toys. JUMBO PEGS make them the best toddler toys for occupational therapy materials. The sorting toys for toddlers and matching game and is made for both little hands and geriatric hands with alzheimers, parkinsons, stroke rehabilitation, autism or special needs.

FINE MOTOR SKILLS TOYS: The occupational therapy toys pegboard toddler stacking set is great for building fine motor skill for toddlers, hand eye coordination, develop and strengthen visual perception skills, visual motor coordination, making patterns & more! These preschool and toddler gifts are developmental toys for boys and girls 3, 4, 5 years of age and puzzles for toddlers or two year old boy toys. They make great sensory toys for autistic children, as both girls and toddler boy toys.

EDUCATIONAL GAMES FOR TODDLERS and PRESCHOOLERS: The Montessori toys for toddlers GROW WITH YOUR CHIILD; as baby blocks you can use as baby learning toys all the way to 5 year olds by Introduce early math concepts with the STEM toys to kids as they sort, match and count the number of sides or points of the 12 shapes. Use the peg board toddler set with your children for sorting, learning color matching, patterning, basic math skills such as counting, adding, subtraction and graphing.

✅ GIFTS FOR GIRLS & BOYS ✅ EASY STORAGE & TRAVEL MONTESSORI TOYS: Gift for 2 year old boy toys and toddler girls toys come with the Skoolzy drawstring backpack to easily store all the peg toys for toddlers pieces and easy clean up. Your 2, 3 and 4 year old can carry their peg board toddler toy set at home, in the car or traveling. The infant toys are great airplane activities for kids! Certified Non-Toxic, BPA-Free, Lead-Free & Phthalates-Free. Great toddler educational toys!

ROAD TRIP FIDGET TOY: PERFECT for ADHD, Autism, Calm or Stress Relief on the go; Thanks to their SATISFYING stacking action the pegs have a soothing effect capturing your attention and helping you calm down and regain focus in stressful of situations. Take one or more pairs to use as fidgets when travelling

GREAT FOR BABIES AND TODDLERS AGES 18 MONTHS+: These toys for toddlers 1-3 year olds are designed to promote counting and early math skills, while also developing pattern and color recognition in an engaging, fun and interactive way. Our Play Ideas e-book for the toddler educational toys set for 2 year olds will help you teach these concepts and have fun with your baby!

AMAZING GIFT CHOICE: Valentines, Easter or a surprise last minute birthday gift for kids, tweens or grownups? Spread the joy and share these popular fidgets with your loved ones; Make someone's day with these stress relief good luck charms! Peg toys make top notch party favor goody bags, pinata fillers, white elephant gifts, easter egg, Christmas, stocking stuffers, secret santa & hottest basket stuffings for boys and girls. Comes with cool storage GIFT BAG

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspiring Their Love of Learning Learn through play Our toddler girl toys age 2-3 encourage the development of core skills & build confidence for school readiness! Perfect for Gifting Makes the perfect gift for any occasion be it holidays, Christmas Gifts for Toddlers, Stocking Stuffers, birthdays, play dates, and more!

The Perfect Christmas Gift or Stocking Stuffer! STACKING PEGS & TOWER CREATION! Everyone loves to make towers & it is not just fun. When towers are created there is a lot more going on behind the scenes: from hand-eye coordination, focus, and attention to concentration, brain-building, and those critical fine motor skills. Keep the mind busy and strong and keep building towers! TEAMWORK AND SHARING It's a struggle to share your toys, but there are more than enough pegs & shapes in this set to share! Teamwork is a critical skill and what better way to start young so your child has a head start in life! Kindness & respect are lessons that can be learned in no time with this Shapes Pegboard Set.

Countless Hours of Toddler STEM Learning Fun SORTING AND PATTERNING So many things to learn..... Stack by COLOR, stack by SHAPE and even create PATTERNS! Take advantage of the 44-page Activity Guide where your little one will start with the basics of counting, sorting, and matching into more advanced concepts such as patterning, addition, subtraction, and more! INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PLAY The perfect toy for an "on-the-go" kinda life! Take anywhere with the convenient TRAVEL TOTE! Whether traveling across the country or just down the street to grandma's house, the backpack with encourage clean up so your little one can take their Shapes Pegboard anywhere.
Learn shape recognition with the 36 PEGS in 12 COLORS and 12 SHAPES! The Shape Peg Board Set comes in 12 colors and 12 shapes. The perfect toy to introduce shapes and colors to your toddlers.

Pegboard Shape Puzzle Set What's Included? 1 orange peg board (8.5") 36 pegs (2") - 12 colors - Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Grey, Light Blue, Brown, Pink, White and Black 1 Skoolzy drawstring backpack (12" x 8") Downloadable parent activity guide for the toddler toys

SAVE 15% NOW ON ANY 3 SKOOLZY TOYS USING PROMO CODE GR8GIFTS AT CHECKOUT! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great educational toy.
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my go-to toys with my job as a pediatric therapist. We work on colors, shapes, fine motor skills, stacking, matching and cleaning up. This toy has held up nicely over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was a goft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for focus and fine & gross motor skills
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly great product! My toddler grand has fun building and stacking with these, all while developing fine & gross motor skills, as well as maintaining some focused play. Nice starter size for one child. After we showed him once how to build, and place the peg in the hole, he was off and running with it! The peg holes in the pad are snug, so we encourage his pushing strength to push the peg into place. You can always buy more if needed once you know if yours will enjoy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mackenzie loves this!
reviews.reviewText: Colors, shapes, building, stacking all kinds of learning going on with this item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this, hours of play!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 18 month old. Specifically for hand and eye coordination then once he gets older for the colors and the shapes recognition. My 4 year old loves to play with it to! He likes to build towers as tall as him, he likes matching the shapes and organizing the colors as well. My 18 month old likes to stack them up and knock them over. I might have to get another set cause they need more pieces between them both to play without fighting over them.As for the only thing I would change or wish was different would be the base. It’s just a lightweight foam piece and when my kids build anything tall it just topples over. I wish it was a heavier base so they could build tall without me needing to hold it for them.Over all it’s definitely a neat toy and probably something my kids will play with many of times not just a once and done toy. I’m glad I bought it and I’d recommend it to others with kids around 18month-4 years old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fun toy especially for a plane trip. Building and shapes are great learning reinforcement for my 3 and 4 yr old grandchildren. Easy to put in a backpack and travel with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It is sturdy and my toddler learns from using it. He loves his playing with it. However, it has sharp edges!!!! I store them where my son can’t reach and put it away immediately. Unfortunately, the triangle fell and I didn’t see it and my son stepped on it and sliced his foot. Please be careful and vigilant with this toy!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave my granddaughter three toys recommended by NYTimes. This is the one that she immediately engaged with and has continued to enjoy!
